description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Purpose
              
              To translate and interpret project documents, in meetings, correspondence and reports from English to Vietnamese and vice versa
              
              To support and assist the Project Manager and the Construction team to ensure the project runs smoothly
              

              Key Responsibilities
              
              Include but not limited to the following:
              
              •	Translate documents and reports from English to Vietnamese and vice versa
              
              •	Interpret in meetings, workshops and field visits, making sure that meeting contents are interpreted accurately
              
              •	Take and distribute meeting minutes
              
              •	Assist the submission and delivery of documents, drawings, deliverable items and correspondence to facilitate the approval process
              
              •	Arrange and manage filling system of incoming/outgoing correspondence
              
              •	Support the document controller or document control system/process
              
              •	Research documents, data of technical and non-technical nature
              
              •	Follow up with subcontractors or material suppliers to ensure the proper documents are received
              
              •	Purchase office equipment, office consumables
              
              •	Perform other tasks assigned by Project Manager
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Bachelor degree with English major
              
              •	Fluent in English and Vietnamese with minimum 5 years of experience as English translator/interpreter
              
              •	Computer literate and experience
              
              •	Ability to handle multi-task with strong organisation skills
              
              •	Experience in construction project is preferable
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13th month payment
               







                15 days annual leave
               







                15 days annual leave
